bike.description: Triple-butted 6061 aluminum with hydro-formed top and down tube, taper gauge "S" bend stays, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc brake mounts, eyeleted dropouts and seatstay rack mounts

components.description: Carbon fiber blades with 7075 alloy steerer, post disc brake mounts, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropouts with single eyelets
FSA Integrated IS threadless with nylon upper Compression ring, 1 1/8"
Alex ID-19 double wall alloy rims, 32H, Formula alloy disc road hubs and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur with Double Shield puncture protection and reflective sidewalls, 700 x 32c
Shimano Claris RD-2400 SS rear and Shimano Claris FD-2400 front
Platform style, steel cage/resin body, toe clip attachable
Tektro HDC-300 Hydraulic disc brake system with 160mm Tektro wave style rotors and Tektro levers
Jamis flat bar, 6061 T-6 aluminum, 31.8 x 10JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x 580mm
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (15/17"), 105mm (19/21"), 115mm (23"). ATS shim length 100mm
Anatomic double density kraton grip with end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm alloy clamp with QR seatpin
Selle San Marco ERA Power with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
